snippet: Researchers are looking for opportunities to identify adolescents who have problems and to provide support.
abstract: Researchers are looking for opportunities to identify adolescents who have internet-related problems without exaggerating the dangers posed by social media and other emerging technologies; some experts have begun to think of social media as another adolescent rite of passage, similar to driving, which must be treated with caution.
lead_paragraph: Researchers are looking for opportunities to identify adolescents who have problems and to provide support.

headline.seo: Seeing Social Media as Adolescent Portal More Than Pitfall
headline.main: Seeing Social Media More as Portal Than as Pitfall
headline.print_headline: Seeing Social Media More as Portal Than as Pitfall
